name: ThemeShakes Co.
description:
For the Mix and Game Jam with the theme "Mixing Genres", we decided to make a game where you literally mix genres, into delicous milkshakes while hordes of greedy, impatient customers wait for you to mix them their perfect drink.

Team;

Ryan Garner - Programming

Dominic Reynolds - Programming and some Art

Tom Walker - Art

John Todd - Music
